title: SCP-5315
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:golden-feast]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:info-ayers
|lang=en
|page=component:info-ayers
|authorPage= https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/trouts-authorpage
|comments=
> Will you chew until it bleeds?
> Can you get up off your knees?
> Are you brave enough to see?
> Do you wanna change it?
( The Hand that Feeds - Nine Inch Nails )

SCP-5315 - Gastronomical Annex]]
[[=]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/=]]
@@ @@

[[div class="blockquote"]]

{{Appetizers}}

**Amuse-Bouche Contagieux**
@@ @@ ^^A beguiling bite-sized morsel that sparks an insatiable desire for fine dining. A delectable blend of cured Iberian ham and truffle-infused foie gras.^^
@@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@**Price:** $12.99
@@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@**Calories:** 120
@@ @@
[[size 10px]]**WARNING:** Foods from SCP-5315 should //not// be consumed under any circumstances. Anomalous effects have so far resulted in the death of several civilians and Foundation personnel.[[/size]]
@@ @@
**Truffle Infusion Crostini**
@@ @@  ^^Baguette slices adorned with a mysterious blend of black truffle, goat cheese, and honey.^^
@@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@**Price:** $16.99
@@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@**Calories:** 180
----
{{Soups and Salads}}

**Bisque de Quarantine**
@@ @@ ^^Decadent seafood bisque with the ability to instill refined tastes in the populace. Includes lobster, saffron, and a hint of cognac.^^
@@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@**Price:** $21.99
@@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@**Calories:** 250
@@ @@
**Ensalada de Élite**
^^Fresh arugula and watercress topped with golden beet carpaccio, and goat cheese crumbles, guaranteed to reshape the local dining landscape.^^
@@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@**Price:** $18.99
@@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@**Calories:** 200
[[size 10px]]**WARNING:** Neighboring businesses experience a decline as residents gravitate towards SCP-5315. Efforts to balance the local economy are in progress.[[/size]]
----
{{Main Courses}}

**Filet de Rareté**
@@ @@ ^^Prime meat cut to perfection, enticing locals to forsake traditional fare.^^
@@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@**Price:** $38.99
@@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@**Calories:** 350
[[size 10px]]**WARNING:** SCP-5315 has grown to the size of a full street, transforming it into a plaza. Efforts to decommission SCP-5315 are underway.[[/size]]

**Saffron Épidémie Risotto**
@@ @@ ^^Prime Wagyu beef filet, sous-vide and finished with a red wine reduction, redefining the culinary expectations.^^
@@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@**Price:** $32.99
@@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@**Calories:** 300
----
{{Desserts}}
**Crème de la Contagion**
@@ @@^^Silky chocolate mousse infused with Grand Marnier and topped with edible gold leaf.^^
@@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@**Price:** $24.99
@@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@**Calories:** 980

**Pavlova Pandémique**
@@ @@^^Light and airy pavlova filled with passion fruit curd, topped with fresh berries and a raspberry coulis.^^
@@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@**Price:** $19.99
@@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@**Calories:** 1020
[[size 10px]]**WARNING:** SCP-5315 has consumed Site-195. Related documentation has since been overwritten.[[/size]]
----
{{Beverages}}

**Libation de Luxe**
@@ @@^^A signature cocktail featuring artisanal gin, elderflower liqueur, and a hint of lavender, garnished with an edible orchid.^^
@@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@**Price:** $14.99
@@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@**Calories:** 150

**Vin Viral**
@@ @@^^An exclusive Bordeaux blend with notes of black currant, truffle, and a subtle hint of [REDACTED].^^
@@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@**Price:** $29.99
@@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@**Calories:** 250
[[size 10px]]**WARNING:** SCP-5315 has consumed half the city of Detroit and is currently enacting a FK-Class "Broken Foundation" Scenario. All non-mandatory actions are to immediately cease and focus on the neutralization of SCP-5315.[[/size]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
> Welcome to the new Foundation, Chef.
> @@ @@
> SERVE, COOK, PREPARE.
